title: Mexico : religion affiliation share 2018 , by type
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Catholic has the highest Share of respondents and Baptist evangelist has the lowest Share of respondents.
Response Baptist evangelist has 808.0 times less Share of respondents than Response Catholic which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 14 number of Responses.
Response Catholic has the highest Share of respondents and Baptist evangelist has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Catholic has the highest Share of respondents and Baptist evangelist has the lowest Share of respondents.
Response Baptist evangelist has 808.0 times less Share of respondents than Response Catholic which is the highest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Catholic and lowest at Response Baptist evangelist.
The highest Response Catholic has 80.7 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Baptist evangelist.

Response Catholic is higher than any other Responses with value 80.8, followed by None, and Believer without formal affiliation to any religion. Down to Response Baptist evangelist with the lowest value 0.1.
Response Adventist, Mormon, Agnostic, and Atheist share the same value 0.2.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 14 Responses is roughly 7.14.

data.Response: Believer without formal affiliation to any religion
